review_data.title: great Korean food
review_data.content: It's a small restaurant/grocery in Seebach. Really good food! I love their Kimchi! Since it's also a grocery, you can also buy the kimchi to take home.

review_data.title: Authentic Korean home cooking with love

review_data.title: yuk gae jang

review_data.title: Delicious Korean Food

review_data.title: One word: Superb!
